channel.title: Black Mesa Tools Help
channel.description:
Hello all! Just bought the game and I'm wanting to port some of my favorite SP mods over to retail.
Sadly, whenever I try to open hammer.exe, hlmv, or any of the tools I get - "Windows cannot access the specified device, path, or file. You may not have the appropriate permission to access the item."
This happens no matter what I do, run as admin or what.
Any Ideas?

item.title: Black Mesa Tools Help
item.dc:creator: CmdrSFC3
item.description:
Hello all! Just bought the game and I’m wanting to port some of my favorite SP mods over to retail.

Sadly, whenever I try to open hammer.exe, hlmv, or any of the tools I get - “Windows cannot access the specified device, path, or file. You may not have the appropriate permission to access the item.”

This happens no matter what I do, run as admin or what.

Any Ideas?

Read full topic
